mapper.select: SELECT customer_id AS searchValue, customer_id AS customerId FROM tb_rili_customer WHERE customer_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue},'%') UNION SELECT customer_name AS searchValue, customer_id AS customerId FROM tb_rili_customer WHERE customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue},'%') UNION SELECT jy_customer_name AS searchValue, customer_id AS customerId FROM tb_rili_customer WHERE jy_customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue},'%')

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_type, customer_org_name, whole_machine_id, jy_machine_name, jy_customer_code, jy_machine_code, jy_customer_name, service_level, mine_level, business_level FROM tb_rili_customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
